Class CartManager

java.lang.Object
CartManager
public class CartManager extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CartManager(ItemManager itemManager)
    Constructs a CartManager with the given ItemManager, which is used to search for items by their ID.

    Description
    void

    Increments the quantity of a specific item in the cart by the given amount.

    printBill()
    Prints a bill for the items in the cart, including item names, quantities, unit prices, subtotals, and the total cost.
    void

    Removes a specified quantity of an item from the shopping cart.
    void
    viewCart()
    Displays the items currently in the shopping cart along with their quantities and total prices.

  • Constructor Details

    • CartManager

      public CartManager(ItemManager itemManager)
      Constructs a CartManager with the given ItemManager, which is used to search for items by their ID.
      Parameters:
      itemManager - The ItemManager to use for item-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart(int itemId, double quantity)
      Adds an item to the shopping cart with the specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to add to the cart.
      quantity - The quantity of the item to add.

    • removeFromCart

      public void removeFromCart(String itemName, double quantity)
      Removes a specified quantity of an item from the shopping cart. If the resulting quantity would be negative, the item is removed from the cart.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to remove.
      quantity - The quantity of the item to remove.

    • viewCart

      public void viewCart()
      Displays the items currently in the shopping cart along with their quantities and total prices.

    • incrementQuantity

      public void incrementQuantity(String itemName, double amount)
      Increments the quantity of a specific item in the cart by the given amount.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to increment.
      amount - The quantity to increment by.

    • decrementQuantity

      public void decrementQuantity(String itemName, double amount)
      Decrements the quantity of a specific item in the cart by the given amount. If the resulting quantity would be negative, the item is removed from the cart.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to decrement.
      amount - The quantity to decrement by.

    • printBill

      public void printBill()
      Prints a bill for the items in the cart, including item names, quantities, unit prices, subtotals, and the total cost.

    • getTotalCost

      public double getTotalCost()
      Calculates the total cost of all items in the shopping cart.
      Returns:
      The total cost of the items in the cart.
